entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
